meanings.sent1: The company tends to overpackage their products, using too much wrapping.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to overpackage items to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The gift was so overpackaged that it took forever to unwrap!
meanings.sent4: She overpackaged her suitcase, making it impossible to close.
meanings.sent5: The store manager warned the employees not to overpackage the fragile items.

meanings.sent1: The overpackage of the toy made it difficult to open.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalist was concerned about the overpackage of the products.
meanings.sent3: The overpackage of the snack was so big, it barely fit in the lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: The overpackage of the electronics was unnecessary and wasteful.
meanings.sent5: The overpackage of the gift made it look extravagant but was not eco-friendly.
